channel.title: PCB on benjiaomodular
channel.description: Recent content in PCB on benjiaomodular

item.title: MiniOSC v2.x
item.description: An analog oscillator based on the 40106 chip. It’s a remake of my very first PCB-based module. I added PWM and Sync inputs. MiniOSC v2.0 I redid the PCB with SMD parts. In fact, I’m in the process of remaking my all my old PCBs into SMT. It’s just easier to keep the layouts clean while keeping the modules small. MiniOSC v2.0 Back I understand that this might make them not so beginner-friendly, so I’m also planning to do a new line of through-hole modules with bigger panels in the future.

item.title: EuroPowerBoard
item.description: Busboard for Eurorack with JST socket options

item.title: MiniAttenuMix
item.description: A 4HP 5-channel CV mixer with attenuverted inputs

item.title: MiniSNH
item.description: An analog sample-and-hold module with probability gates

item.title: MiniLFO
item.description: A super simple 2HP triangle wave LFO

item.title: MiniVerb v1.x
item.description: A reverb module based around Electrosmith’s Daisy Seed DSP platform.

item.title: SynthCard
item.description: An oscillator module built into a business card

item.title: MiniDelay
item.description: A basic PT2399 delay designed to work with Eurorack modular synth.

item.title: MiniVCF
item.description: A 4HP Voltage Controlled Filter using a diode ladder design

item.title: MiniADSR
item.description: A four parameter envelope generator on PCB

item.title: MiniVCA
item.description: A linear Voltage Controled Amplifier based around an LM13700 OTA IC.

item.title: MiniOSC
item.description: A simple CD40106-based VCO with sawtooth and pulse waveform outputs.
